titles.title: To suspend temporarily the rate of duty on Encapsulated Ascorbic Acid.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 5/8/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United State to suspend temporarily the duty on Encapsulated Ascorbic Acid.
